snippet.title: Misc. A Tiny Tale - Indie Game Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist Misc. A Tiny Tale on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1308940/Misc_A_Tiny_Tale/

Embark on an adventure as a tiny robot made of miscellaneous parts. Collect trash, coins, cogs, and more as you help friends around you. Make the world a better place, one tiny task at a time.

Song: "We're Miscellaneous" feat. RAYM
from Misc. A Tiny Tale OST.

Release Date: 2025
Platforms: Nintendo Switch, Steam

Join our Discord: https://discord.com/invite/Zw3UqMrB4b
Follow us on Bluesky: https://bsky.app/profile/miscatinytale.bsky.social
Follow us on X: https://x.com/miscatinytale
Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/tinywaregames/
Press Kit: https://drive.google.com/drive/u/2/folders/1RkbvhYW-wAtr3stpoidV9X_wJJMdVeP3

#NintendoSwitch #UE4 #Switch #UnrealEngine #Misc #MiscATinyTale #3dplatformer #cozygaming #gaming #GameDev #IndieGame #Steam
